analysisMethod: Round-trip wallet detection - wallets appearing as both input source and output destination
findings: 3 wallets identified that BOTH sent to AND received from SilentSwap
These round-trip users have their privacy compromised
vulnerabilities: MEDIUM: 3 wallets exposed via round-trip usage (same wallet sends AND receives)
HIGH: Low timing entropy (0%). Swap completion times are predictable.
MEDIUM: 100% of multi-output swaps have unique split patterns.
MEDIUM: Cross-chain timing is observable. Solana input â†’ Solana output timing can be tracked even through Secret Network.
CRITICAL: 3 of 3 matches have >70% confidence. Privacy is severely compromised.
recommendations: Use separate wallets for sending and receiving to avoid round-trip exposure.
Randomize processing times to make correlation harder.
Avoid splitting outputs to multiple wallets, or use standard split ratios (50/50, 33/33/34).
Hold funds in Secret Network for variable periods (hours to days) before output.
